timeline.bodyText: Why do we need runAsync here if the importBlock is async itself?
timeline.author: Nashatyrev

replies.bodyText: importBlock may be async but isn't guaranteed to be. If the checkpoints and state required are already available in the in-memory store, the block import will happen synchronously.
replies.author: ajsutton
